alert.note: Alert for Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 23 at 5:54PM MST until November 24 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 5 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches across the higher terrain, with 2 to 6 inches across the southern I-25 Corridor. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains and the Raton Mesa and southern I-25 Corridor, including Walsenburg and Trinidad. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 5 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Snow and blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, with hazardous travel conditions expected, especially across Raton Pass.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
